availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac Raney (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Eunice Coulson Raney in Harrison County, Kentucky, in December 1822. Father of Alfred Raney and Eunice Raney. Married to Sarah Ann Rice Raney in Grant County in May 1837. Father of Daniel Raney, Elizabeth Raney, Thomas B. Raney, Josephus Raney, Milton Raney, Franklin Raney, Mary Raney, Sarah Raney. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Harrison County in 1861.
